txt.en:
\qSsh! The Haradrim will hear us. What business have you in this land?'

You explain that Gladhir sent you in search of him.

'I see. It is fortunate you arrived when you did. I have discovered how the Haradrim were able to gather in such great number here without our being aware. They have been constructing ladders along the cliffs to bring men and supplies over the Emyn Arnen. Without the ladders, they would need to pass through a chokepoint on the Harad road, which is closely watched. Needless to say, we must hinder these schemes immediately.'
Ost Sarram is located upon the southern cliffs in the western side of Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should destroy Haradrim ladders upon the cliffs to stop the flow of men and supplies.
Ost Sarram is located upon the southern cliffs in the western side of Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should talk to Mírthel near Ost Sarram.
Ost Sarram is located upon the southern cliffs in the western side of Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should speak to Mírthel near Ost Sarram.
'Good work! That will surely slow the Haradrim down enough that we may alert more Rangers to the situation.'
Mírthel motions you to come closer and make no noise

'First among all things, we must find what became of Mírthel. It will be fastest to divide our search in two. I will continue up the road to the bridge. You go and search the southern cliffs and among Ost Sarram, which lie upon them.'
TBD Ranger 2 is worried about the Haradrim's plans of ferrying supplies and men over the cliffs
The Ranger Mírthel remains missing and Gladhir has sent you to the southern cliffs in search of his comrade.
Ost Sarram is located upon the southern cliffs in the western side of Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should search for Mírthel near Ost Sarram.
